import React, { useState } from 'react' const CreateResume = () => { const[resumeValues, setResumeValues] = useState({ firstName:'', middleName:'', lastName:'', emailId:'', contactNumber:'', address:'', city:'', state:'', pincode:'', nationality:'', heading:{ heading:'', summary:'' }, education:[{ course:'', college:'', board:'', percentage:'', yearOfPass:'' }], experience:[ { organisation:'', designation:'', from:'', to:'' } ], skills:[{ skillName:'' }]}) const handleAddEducation = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setResumeValues(prevValues => ({ ...prevValues, education: [ ...prevValues.education, { course: '', college: '', board: '', percentage: '', yearOfPass: '' } ] })); }; const handleDeleteEducation = (e,i) => { e.preventDefault() setResumeValues(prevValues => ({ ...prevValues, education: prevValues.education.filter((_, index) => index !== i) })); }; const handleAddExperience = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setResumeValues(prevValues => ({ ...prevValues, experience: [ ...prevValues.experience, { organisation:'', designation:'', from:'', to:'' } ] })); } const handleDeleteExperience = (e,i) => { e.preventDefault() setResumeValues(prevValues => ({ ...prevValues, experience: prevValues.experience.filter((_, index) => index !== i) })); } const handleAddSkills = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } return (
